task.title: Allow a Module to Be Used

section.p: An administrator can grant Deploy Module permissions to a role, such as the Content Manager, to allow users in that role to add the module to a page.

li.xref: The host must install the extension package containing the module.
If the module is set as premium, the host must allow the site to use it.

step.cmd: If the role/user you want is already in the table, check the Deploy Module box for that role/user.

image.alt: Check Deploy Module box for that role/user.

step.cmd: If the role/user you want is not yet in the table, add.

choice.p: To add a role, expand the Select Role dropdown and choose the role you want to allow. Click/Tap Add.

image.alt: Add the role to the table.

choice.p: To add a user, start entering the user's display name in the Display Name field. A few names with partial matches will be offered. Choose the correct one, then click/tap Add.

image.alt: Add a user to the table.

result.p: The added role/user is automatically assigned Deploy Module permissions.

image.alt: After adding a role and a user.
